quests.desc: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Your first objective is to go to the east. Then, venture south. With that over with, attempt to travel south. Then, lift the iron from the floor of the shower. After stealing the iron, you can insert the iron inside the cabinet. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower. An usual one. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out a safe.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You're now in a study. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_0]On the mantelpiece you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You scan the room for a chair, and you find a chair. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the chair. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a stand. The stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cellar. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You make out a coffer.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the lounge. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You see a recliner. The recliner is normal.[if there is something on the s_3] On the recliner you see [a list of things on the s_3]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the vault. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] display, which looks typical, in the corner.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The display contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The display is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a workbench. The workbench is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the workbench you can see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
I just think it's great that you've just entered a laundromat.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the bedroom.

 You see a bar. [if there is something on the s_5]On the bar you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bedchamber. A standard one.

 You see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a parlor.

 You make out a couch. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the couch. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookery. A standard kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You see a shelf. The shelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_7] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_7]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: coffer
infos.desc: The coffer looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: display
infos.desc: The display looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: locker
infos.desc: The locker looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: iron
infos.desc: The iron appears out of place here

infos.name: mantelpiece
infos.desc: The mantelpiece is unstable.

infos.name: chair
infos.desc: The chair is stable.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is undependable.

infos.name: recliner
infos.desc: The recliner is stable.

infos.name: workbench
infos.desc: The workbench is reliable.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc: The bar is shaky.

infos.name: couch
infos.desc: The couch is durable.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is wobbly.

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: sandwich
infos.desc: The sandwich looks heavenly.

infos.name: legume
infos.desc: that's an usual legume!

infos.name: latchkey
infos.desc: The metal of the latchkey is polished.

infos.name: passkey
infos.desc: The passkey is heavy.

infos.name: insect
infos.desc: The insect appears to be well matched to everything else here

objective: Welcome to another exciting session of TextWorld! First step, travel east. That done, travel south. And then, go south. With that over with, pick-up the iron from the floor of the shower. After that, you can put the iron into the cabinet in the shower. And once you've done that, you win!
